---
title: "About"
---


StatChat is an informal but informative get-together of local statistics educators. 

<br /><br />

## Current Organizers

StatChat is currently being organized by [Alicia Johnson](mailto:ajohns24@macalester.edu?subject=StatChat) (Macalester College), [Laura Le](mailto:free0312@umn.edu?subject=StatChat) (University of Minnesota), and [Andrew Zieffler](mailto:zief0002@umn.edu?subject=StatChat) (University of Minnesota).

## Original Organizers

StatChat was originally conceived by Joan Garfield (University of Minnesota), Danny Kaplan (Macalester College), and Julie Legler (St. Olaf) circa 2005.
